thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Paul Robinson
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Paul Robinson

author: Paul Robinson
title: Paul Robinson
text:
Rented a car for 2 nights initially, car was in good condition and service was great. We needed to extend the rental one more night after the second day, and they handled that happily over the phone and we paid the difference when we returned. They also told us where we could refuel nearby before returning it.
The only slightly negative was I'd never driven a Toyota with remote hey ignition before. Took a while to figure out I had to put my foot on the brake first. They could've told me that little tidbit. But live and learn I guess. :)
